title: Jon Hamm joins the show!
description:
Top Gun: Maverick star Jon Hamm joins the show to talk about the high-flying movie and his St. Louis sports fandom. Jon Hamm tells us what it was like to join the star-studded sequel and what it was like working with the action star himself, Tom Cruise. Also, the Celtics took down the Heat in game 5. The Heat again looked ice cold from behind the arc, the guys tell you whether that will transfer to the elimination game 6 tomorrow. Plus, game 5 tonight for the Warriors and Mavericks, might Luka play well enough to extend this to game 6. Find out all that and more.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Jalen Rose, David Jacoby
